title: SKT SKINS???
body: I have been up at ridiculous hours for the past few days waiting for the sKT T1 Skins and they're not here?

replies.body: It's going to likely be released during the evening of EUW's time... On their July 5th -.- I think Riot should have released them much earlier, personally. Saves the confusion. So Apparently in a few hours. If they don't by 9 am AEST today I'm going to be a little bit more than disappointed since that's midnight in the UK. Legit saving 4K RP just so I can get Jhin and Syndra for me and Nami for my friend. -.-
